Key Match Events: India conceded an early seventh-minute goal
Syria scored the second goal against the run of play in the 77th minute
A third goal in the 96th minute was the final dagger for India
Pre-Game Insights: India conceded an early goal, but they were more composed and cohesive in the second half
Syria have the quality to break the Indian defence at any moment
India will still retain hope despite trailing by one goal
Post-Match Reflections: New head coach Manolo Marquez suffered his first loss as India coach
He's yet to win a game nor see his side score a goal
India finished last in the Intercontinental Cup 2024, behind Mauritius on goal difference
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian football team is in action again in exactly a month's time, as they take on Vietnam on October 9, before facing Lebanon on October 12
Manolo Marquez would hope to have a better grip on how his team functions by then
